Text-widget.cursor: The type of the cursor to be used.
Text-widget.insetofftime: The time in milliseconds for which the cursor blink is off.
Text-widget.insertontime: the time in milliseconds for which the cursor blink is on.
Text-widget.state: defines if the widget will be responsive to mouse or keyboards movements.
Text-widget.highlightthickness: defines the thickness of the focus highlight.
Text-widget.insertionwidth: defines the width of insertion character.
Text-widget.relief: type of the border which can be SUNKEN, RAISED, GROOVE and RIDGE.
Text-widget.yscrollcommand: to make the widget vertically scrollable
Text-widget.xscrollcommand: to make the widget horizontally scrollable
